qas.question: How many clubs are on the island?

answers.text: There are four clubs on the island

qas.question: Who are the reigning league champions?
Where are the Women's games played?
What did the Bermuda u/19 team win?
What country has a proud Union Rugby community?
Who did Bermuda 7's team defeat in 2010?
What are played at the Academy of Warwick?

context: <b5_0>Bermuda<b5_0/> has developed a proud Rugby Union community. <a0_0><b6_0>The Bermuda Rugby Union team<b6_0/><a0_0/> won the 2011 Caribbean championships, defeating Guyana in the final. They previously beat The Bahamas and Mexico to take the crown. Rugby 7's is also played, with four rounds scheduled to take place in the 2011–2012 season. The Bermuda 7's team competed in the 2011 Las Vegas 7's, defeating <b7_0>the Mexican team<b7_0/>. <a1_0>There are four clubs on the island<a1_0/>: (1) Police (2) Mariners (3) Teachers (4) Renegades. There is a men's and women's competition–current league champions are <a2_0>Police (Men)<a2_0/> (winning the title for the first time since the 1990s) and Renegades (women's). <b8_0>Games<b8_0/> are currently played at <a3_0>Warwick Academy.<a3_0/> <b9_0>Bermuda u/19<b9_0/> team won the <a4_0>2010 Caribbean Championships<a4_0/>.
